channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Build reports faster with Azure Resource Graph
item.description:
Introduction Hi folks! My name is Felipe Binotto, Cloud Solution Architect, based in Australia.
If you are hands-on with Azure operations, I’m sure at some point you have been asked to provide some type of report containing information about your Azure environment.
In the past, the only way to provide this information was to programmatically iterate through all your subscriptions and retrieve the data, subscription by subscription.
Throughout this article I will provide a couple examples on how you would accomplish that task in the traditional way compared to using the Azure Resource Gra...
